data.actual_result: The badge is not there and you have to disable and enable it in settings (however, sometimes it randomly stops working and you can't disable/enable for it to show up)  -
data.expected_result: If you have the notification badge enabled usually, you should see it when starting discord
data.short_description: Notification badge sometimes does not work
data.steps_to_repro: - (If you have discord open) close discord - Open discord again - Look at the discord icon
